page.title: 09SINCLAIR C5 CARS
page.content: {Sir Clive Sinclair}has recently invented and produced a novel electric car designed to appeal to people wishing to escape from normal petrol driven vehicles.In 1985 we visited the Research Department at the Science Park,and we learned that Sinclair hope to be producing a 4 seater family car with a range of above 100 miles and running completely on batteries within 10 years .Sir Clive Sinclair was also responsible for the first cheap computer the ZX80 and followed this up with the ZX81,the Spectrum and the QL. In 1985 his computer company struggled and had to be helped by Sir Robert Maxwell,a famous publisher.His C5 has not been selling well and only time will tell as to whether the future for transport lies with this sort of development.
